trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the cHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: A lap adapter biztosít a cHTML készlet.

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Adapterek ASP.NET általában össze automatikusan, és egy alapértelmezett konstruktorral kell rendelkeznie.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: Hoz létre, és a szöveg író megfelelő-e az adott adapter adja vissza.

trans-unit.target: A szöveg író.

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: A megadott adapter alkalmas szöveg író.

trans-unit.source: Called to determine the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: Neve a visszaküldési adatgyűjtés meghatározásához.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref> objektum, amely tartalmazza a kérelem információkat, például a HTTP-fejlécek.

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény adatforrásának azonosítóját.

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: Az event argumentum azonosítója.

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: Visszaküldési származó adatok gyűjtését, a request objektumon.

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the baseCollection parameter.
trans-unit.target: Módosított változatát a baseCollection paraméter.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: Kiértékeli, hogy az eszközillesztő-készlet a megadott kérelem vonatkozik.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Ez az API már elavult.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|N/A|
trans-unit.target: | Osztály |} Vissza |} Előnyben részesített megjelenítési típusa |} Ellenőrizze a JavaScript tulajdonság értékének |} |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Ellenőrzi, hogy a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>értéke <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>vagy <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. |} Visszaadja a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> `true`. |} | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Ellenőrzi, hogy-e a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>vagy <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>. |} A <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>eszköz képességét adja vissza `false`. |} | <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>| `true`| Ellenőrzi, hogy-e a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>vagy <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>. |} N/A|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális kérés környezete.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the header associated with postbacks.
